title: Interpretation of black spots in a dream and seeing black spots in a dream

preview.text:
Dreaming of black spots indicates the presence of secrets and other interpretations that we will explain to the single woman, married woman, pregnant woman, divorced woman, man, such as black pimples on the face, black spots on the nose, or cleaning the nose of black spots, or removing and removing black spots from the face, body, hand, neck, or throat. Ibn Sirin and others in continuation of the subject below: Interpretation of black spots in dreams 
Because blackheads are a collection of some waste or toxins that the body cannot get rid of, the symbol of blackheads in a dream indicates your inability to get rid of some negativity that you are suffering from in your life. 
Black spots that invade the body often have connotations in a dream that are primarily related to the dreamer's situation, as the appearance of black spots in a dream can indicate a failure or malfunction in the moral, psychological, or spiritual aspect. 
Black spots can indicate the presence of causes that can make your life negative or ugly, and the presence of black spots in a dream can indicate your discomfort or dissatisfaction with the image that people see you in. 
The vision of removing black spots from the body in a dream indicates a change that is happening in your life, perhaps in your behavior or personality, or something new that is coming to you. Similarly, seeing the removal of black spots indicates relief and the disappearance of their worries, and the vision promises you happiness. 
The presence of black spots on the face in a dream expresses dissatisfaction with your image and your position in your environment. 
As for appearance, black spots on the hand in a dream indicate the acquisition of laziness. 
Whoever sees in a dream that one of the black spots has appeared on his face and opened, and pus or pus has come out of it, it means that the dreamer will succeed. 
And whoever sees in his dream that there are many black spots that have appeared on his body, then he will get a lot of money according to the amount and duration of time, and his anxiety and the appearance of black spots on his body will disappear. As long as the clothes are not contaminated. 
And whoever saw black spots on her face, the groom will propose to her if she is not married, or will be affected by envy or the envious eye, or envy will affect her after childbirth if she is married. 
Whoever saw black spots on the neck in a dream or defiled his face or clothes, it indicates worries, debts, and bad words. 
The appearance of pimples in a dream on the face indicates a deficiency in religion, such as leaving prayer. 
Dreaming of blackheads means that you have embarrassing feelings about yourself that you don't want anyone to notice, and a sign that there are many embarrassing things in yourself that you prefer to deal with privately in the hope that they won't draw attention to them. 
And the dream of black spots on the nose in a dream indicates calm, peace, relaxation, and an indication that you have the same strength and abilities as those around you, so you should not shake your confidence in yourself because you are in a position to do what others do, and if you believe in it, you will live an extraordinary life. 
The presence of black spots in a dream is a warning from your subconscious that there is something that you will feel comfortable if you start to confess it to others, and an indication that you should not hide your weaknesses and feelings from those close to you. You, on the contrary, need to be social and share your fears with others, and in this way you can find comfort. 
The black spots in your dream indicate the hidden aspects of your personality, and a sign that you may be trying to cover up something. 
Simply having black marks in your dream means you're willing to tolerate or forget someone's betrayal, and your dream may symbolize that you don't tolerate your opinion and don't understand the issue of imposing your views on others. 
The vision tells you that it may be time to fix it before the situation worsens because this may cause you to lose a loved one or be fired from your job or similar problems that you don't need, all you have to do is be more calm and listen to others because you can't always be the one with the right opinion, perhaps others have better opinions and ideas than you. 
Interpretation of black spots in a dream by Ibn Sirin 
Black spots in this dream represent an improper lifestyle or unhealthy diet, and this vision also indicates that you feel constrained by obstacles and obstacles. 
The appearance of many black marks in a dream means that you may need to make more room for other things in your life, and your dream indicates your need to take responsibility for your life and carry out the responsibilities you have without relying on others as well. 
This vision shows that you should trust your gut feeling, intuition, and emotions. 
Dreaming of blackheads (which are clogged dark pores on the face) is an indicator that the image or appearance of the person being seen in front of others will be embarrassing and ugly, or it may indicate the collapse of his physical appearance and physical health or insecurity or exposure to a personal problem. 
In rare cases, this vision is a warning of serious health problems, and when you dream of a blackhead on your face, it means you will receive a notification from someone, a friend or family member, to take more care of your personal appearance, don't worry about these things just ask for help from those who appreciate you to know what suits you and what doesn't and start working on solving these types of private problems. 
Dreams related to blackheads can appear when you are stressed at work or your business has started to go wrong, if you have such a dream, you should take a break for yourself and ask to hire new qualified people and help them with the cases Manage the work carefully and without imposing your opinions and ideas to avoid tensions. 
Dreams about blackheads can occur when you are insecure about certain aspects of your life that are being examined, or about things that might make you laugh if someone saw them, things that make you feel uncomfortable because we always can't stop caring what others see. Think and look at our personalities, and drawing attention to something you don't want others to know for sure will make you feel uncomfortable. 
For example, a wealthy young man dreamed of seeing a woman with her nose full of black spots in a dream, and after that his business collapsed and he lost. And he expressed his hope that no one would discover that he had become poor and that he was ashamed of his poverty, and he hoped to improve his financial situation without being seen. 
Another example is a young man who dreamed of seeing black spots on his nose in a dream, and in his life he bought some things from a cheap company, and he didn't always want others to notice his relationship with this company.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a whale according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html:
html

A whale dream symbolizes kindness, calmness, and other interpretations. We will interpret it for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, such as seeing a blue whale in the sea, or killing a black whale, or catching a big whale , or eating. Whale meat at Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq and others in:

Interpretation of the whale in a dream

Seeing a whale in a dream is good news for an increase in good and blessings in the life of the visionary, as he will enter into new projects and will be able to overcome all the hardships and problems he has gone through in previous periods and will avoid all harm.
As for seeing a dead whale in a dream, it means the opposite, as it indicates that the dreamer is suffering from problems at work and that his financial circumstances have faltered a lot.
Seeing a large whale in a dream means that you are embarking on a large project and that you are able to control and manage it
In some cases, a whale dream indicates isolation. It also has connotations of peace, tranquility, and purity.

Whoever saw a whale in a dream and felt fear, then the dream indicates that confusion and fear will prevail over the dreamer in life because of an unexpected situation for him.
Seeing the whale being caught indicates the presence of a person who is exploiting your personality or trying to harm you because of his jealousy of you, and this vision also indicates the presence of envious people and enemies.
For mothers, the whale dream refers to maternal feelings and points to a woman who wants to protect her children.
Often seeing a whale in a dream means that things related to the mind and mind will go well, so this dream comes to you to make you feel reassured, which explains the appearance of the whale in a dream for those who live with problems and are a sign of an imminent solution, so there is no need to worry. .

The whale in the dream indicates exposure to danger and in this dream it is also an indication that the dreamer has the ability to adapt and win.
Among the positive things in seeing a whale in a dream is that it indicates kindness and shows that the dreamer is safe, and the whale in the vision is security for the fearful and victory for the oppressed.
The whale in a dream is a sign of earning money and abundant spoils.
If you dream of a whale approaching a ship, it means that you will face a struggle due to many duties and responsibilities and you will be threatened with the loss of some property.
If you see the whale overturn the ship, it means that you will enter a period of disasters and sad incidents.
But if the whale leaves in the dream and everything is calm, it means achieving success and living happily.
Seeing an angry whale in a dream can indicate worry, sadness, and loss of position.

Interpretation of seeing a whale in a dream for Ibn Sirin

The dream interpreter Muhammad ibn Sirin says that the whale in a dream is a strong symbol of family life and teamwork, and the vision also shows that the dreamer has a high degree of wisdom, as well as longevity and physical strength.

Seeing a whale fish in a dream means that the dreamer will face big problems in his professional life, but he will overcome them in a short time and achieve great success and livelihood. Whoever sees a whale in a dream and has problems, it means that his relationship with his family will improve and he will live a happy life with them.

Seeing a whale in a dream means that the dreamer is going through happy situations and events in his family and professional life that he has not experienced before, and this dream also indicates that his financial income will increase greatly, which will help him buy basic necessities.

The brown whale indicates kindness and intimacy for those who want to get married.
Whoever sees a whale on his bed, this indicates a disease that will befall him soon

Anyone who sees himself eating the meat of a live whale will gain power and high status, and if he eats a salted whale, he will be seriously harmed.
Whoever sees that he is buying a whale, this indicates that the dreamer will get married, and if the roasted whale descends from the sky, it means that the request has been answered.

Interpretation of the whale in the dream of al-Nabulsi

  1. The whale in the dream indicates the fulfillment of desires, and it indicates dignity and shows respect and a strong personality.
  2. When you sleep on your right side and dream of seeing a whale, it may indicate that you are righteous.
  3. Or it may indicate worry, anxiety, deterioration of condition, and the resolution of anger
  4. Seeing the whale of Jonah, peace be upon him, in a dream means safety for the fearful, wealth for the poor, and relief for the distressed.
  5. If you see or work with a whale in your dreams, you will form an alliance that brings you real benefit

Interpretation of catching a whale in a dream

Whoever sees catching a whale in a dream, it indicates that the dreamer will solve his problems by entering a new work and in fact he will be able to overcome the problems completely and the periods of fatigue and sadness will end, and he will live a happy and comfortable life with his family.

Whoever sees that he has caught a large whale in a dream, this indicates that he will gain great benefit and good.
Whoever chases a whale from muddy waters, it means that the dreamer will be harmed by it and disturbed.

Interpretation of a whale attacking me in a dream

Seeing a whale attack in a dream indicates that the dreamer has faced some problems in his professional life despite its stability in all previous periods, and many family problems will appear to him, through which he will cause quarrels and competitions with family members.

Interpretation of seeing the whale of Jonah in a dream

  1. Seeing a whale in a dream indicates the right and may indicate seeing a place of worship for the righteous, or it may indicate worry and anxiety and loss of status.
  2. Seeing the whale of Jonah in a dream is security for the fearful, wealth for the poor, and comfort from distress and wealth for the deserving.
  3. Seeing a shark in a dream indicates great ambition and nobility in origin

Interpretation of a group of whales in a dream

Whales are known for their cooperative behavior with each other, so if your dream includes a group of whales, it may indicate that you are working to improve teamwork or family life.
This dream also indicates that you will face a period of challenges in your life and may have taken on a large project or a challenging new job.
The whales in your dream may indicate the support and help available around you, so don't be afraid to ask for help.
There is another possible meaning, which is that you will participate in helping and you will do this as part of a team, working together to achieve a common goal.

Interpretation of killer whales in a dream

Seeing killer whales in a dream may indicate the strength of your emotions or instincts, and if you are happy in your dream, then your strong emotions will achieve positive results.
If the opposite is true, that is, you were sad in the dream, it means that the strength of your emotions will overwhelm you and you will not control yourself in difficult life situations.

Interpretation of humpback whales in a dream

Dream interpreters believe that seeing whales in a dream means that you will create a new and different path in your life.

Are you thinking about making a big change? Maybe you are applying for a new job or thinking about moving. The humpback can symbolize the size of the upcoming transformation.

Interpretation of a dream of buying a plastic comb in a dream

  • May indicate buying a plastic comb in a dream that there are loyal people in the dreamer's life during this time.
  • Seeing and buying a plastic comb in a dream may indicate overcoming some difficulties and problems in the dreamer's life during this period.
  • Whoever dreams of buying a plastic comb , may indicate the arrival of good news at that time by the grace of God.

Interpretation of a dream of a comb without teeth in a dream

Interpretation of a dream of providing a comb in a dream

  • In the event of seeing someone giving a comb to another person, this may indicate advice that this person gives to the man.

title: Interpretation of a dream about short clothes according to Ibn Sirin

preview.text: Seeing short clothes in a dream means failure in tasks and other meanings. We will refer to the single, married, pregnant, divorced, man, such as wearing a short dress or skirt, or buying a short dress, or I dreamed that I was wearing short clothes for Ibn Sirin, and others in continuation of the topic: Interpreting short clothes in a dream Wearing tight clothes in a dream means that someone will mock you, and the dream also shows clarity of mind and that the dreamer wants to live in peace, comfort and stability. The unmarried girl, if she sees a short dress or dress, it is a defect in her religion or a lack of her health, and if she is married, it may be a lack of her worship or that her husband is backward. The short dress for the unmarried girl indicates that a secret will be revealed to you, or that it indicates negligence in religious matters, or that an unsuitable groom will come to you. And short clothes for a married woman indicate that there is someone who is trying to change her image with her husband, especially if she does not cover her head, this indicates that her husband may leave her or travel away from her. If the clothes are close or dirty in the dream, this situation may indicate the bad condition of the seer, and that they are among those whose morals have become corrupt or that they have drowned in their lusts and their distance from God Almighty. The girl who sees in her dream that she is wearing short clothes in a dream, her vision shows her shortness in worship, such as prayer, fasting or charity. It was said that seeing short clothes in a dream could mean that a man is proposing to the girl who sees the vision, but he does not match the qualities of this girl and does not suit her. Seeing wearing tight clothes in a dream may indicate a scandal and revealing secrets that the girl who sees the vision is trying to hide in reality, and that these secrets will become clear and known to the family and people. Whoever sees in his dream that he is wearing short clothes and finds them close to his height in the dream, then the vision is considered a warning, preaching and a warning to the seer so that he knows well his position with God. He is a person who does not perform his worship in himself and is far from God. Interpretation of short clothes in a dream for Ibn Sirin The dream in which you wear tight clothes is evidence of your desire to be in a relationship and experience love, and this dream also indicates that you may be in conflict with someone or that there is something you refuse to hear or believe. And this dream is evidence of strength, power and endurance. Wearing short clothes means that you appreciate the things you have and the things you can access, but this vision may indicate that you are taking a step back and looking at the facts carefully. The dream of short clothes may indicate a situation or a relationship that ended prematurely and you may feel that someone has violated you. Wearing short clothes in your dream means that you will be looking for people who are close to you and dear to you, but this vision means that you will become very negligent. Wearing short clothes in a dream is evidence of a minor failure in your plans or that you are stuck in a problem or a bad health condition. Seeing short clothes in a dream means that you may be ready to start a family, but your dream is an indicator that you should be careful in matters of love and emotion because they can be fleeting. The dream of short clothes refers to the person who provides you with guidance, support and assistance, and this vision also indicates that you need to prove yourself to others. This vision can tell you that you will be defensive about something or that you will be looking for solutions to a problem, and this dream shows fear or uncertainty about the relationship. Buying short clothes in your dream means that all your suffering and problems have dissipated and ended. The dream of short clothes shows your ideals and your pursuit of perfection and success, and the dream also tells you that you need to reassess your resources and money and manage them better before they run out. Seeing short clothes in a dream means that you will be disappointed in yourself, and this is an indication that the dreamer will take on some issues or responsibilities at work, and this vision also shows that you are looking for comfort in the wrong places. The dream of short clothes suggests feelings of bitterness, sadness or death, and indicates that you may be closing your inner feelings and emotions or that you will be imposing your thoughts and beliefs on others. Unfortunately, your dream is a warning about your fears or lack of self-confidence and that you may be overly controlling in the relationship or not giving your lover a chance to express his opinion. The dream in which you wear short clothes means that you are at the end of a relationship or a stage in your life and that you may refuse to take responsibility for your actions and that you will be preparing for an important stage in your life. Your dream of wearing short clothes indicates your fear of revealing secrets or doing some undesirable actions that may involve depriving someone of their rights. To read a detailed interpretation of a dream about a short dress from the link >> Interpretation of a short dress in a dream Interpretation of a short dress in a dream The short dress in a dream is one of the visions that we often see in many forms, as we can see a short dress in many colors, or see a person wearing a short dress, or someone who sees that his clothes have become too short for him, and other detailed interpretations. Seeing a short dress in a dream is one of the things that are not praiseworthy in all its cases, but only in some cases that we mention, unlike seeing a long dress in a dream, which indicates strong faith in all its meanings and cases. Ibn Sirin says that the short dress in a dream indicates the arrival of happy news for the woman, especially if the dress is white in the dream. If you see a short blue dress in a dream, this means that you will get great wealth and great kindness, but seeing a torn short dress in a dream indicates sadness and suffering from diseases Wearing a short dress in a dream indicates abandoning religious duties, prayers and fasting Wearing a short dress in a dream means weakness of faith, corruption of morals and not following religion

title: Learn about the interpretation of dreaming about riding a plane with someone, according to Ibn Sirin.

preview.text:
Dreaming of riding a plane with someone is a common dream with various interpretations. It often symbolizes the dreamer's determination to achieve their goals, no matter how challenging they may be. If the dreamer sees someone with them, it indicates the presence of someone who will accompany them on their journey, offering valuable support and assistance. 

According to Ibn Sirin, riding a plane with someone generally signifies stability in the dreamer's life and the attainment of long-held aspirations. The dream also reflects the dreamer's ability to overcome obstacles and challenges, ultimately leading to a more secure and stable life. 

Riding a plane with someone suggests that the dreamer needs someone's support and guidance to navigate life's complexities. This dream indicates that the person who can offer this support will soon enter the dreamer's life. 

Flying in a plane with someone suggests the dreamer is embarking on a new venture with a partner, resulting in substantial profits and gains in a short period. 

For a single woman, dreaming of flying with someone she knows signifies a shared interest that will lead to significant achievements and gains. If the person in the dream is someone she loves, it is a positive sign of an upcoming engagement. 

For a married woman, dreaming of flying with someone she knows suggests her husband will receive a promotion, bringing prosperity and happiness to their lives. If she dreams of flying with her husband, it indicates the strong love and affection they share, as well as his dedication to her happiness and well-being. 

If a pregnant woman dreams of flying with someone, it indicates the nearness of her delivery date and the importance of being prepared. The dream also assures her of a prosperous and joyous future. If she is anxious about childbirth, the dream signifies a smooth and painless delivery in the final months of her pregnancy. 

For a divorced woman, dreaming of flying in a plane represents the fulfillment of her lifelong dreams. Seeing a plane in a dream symbolizes elevation, prestige, and a prominent position the dreamer will achieve. If a divorced woman dreams of flying with her ex-husband, it suggests a potential reconciliation, with a significant improvement in their relationship and a return of stability and love to their lives. 

For a man, dreaming of flying in a plane with someone signifies entering a partnership in a project, resulting in substantial profits and gains in the near future. For a married man, dreaming of flying with someone indicates the possibility of having another child. 

Dreaming of flying with someone you love carries many positive interpretations. It suggests the dreamer will attain a prestigious position in their career, especially if the person in the dream is a partner. For a woman, this dream suggests an imminent marriage to the person she loves. 

Dreaming of flying with someone you love signifies an upcoming journey and the dreamer's ability to achieve their goals. 

Dreaming of flying with a deceased person suggests that the dreamer is apprehensive about certain issues in their life and unable to make important decisions.

title: Interpretation of a Dream About Fire According to Ibn Sirin

preview.html:
html

Seeing fire in a dream is one of the visions that causes fear and severe panic for the viewer, which makes him seek its correct interpretation, which differs according to the viewer's case or what he saw in his dream. And the editing and interpretation of scholars, and we will respond to you through this article for all the clues that it brings ... The vision of prominent jurists.

Fire in the dream

  • The jurists say that fire in a dream is generally a sign that the dreamer has committed a great sin and will be punished for it in this world and the Hereafter. The machinations of a conspiracy against him in this world.
  • Seeing a fire breaking out without causing harm to the dreamer is interpreted as an indication of the presence of many difficulties and struggles surrounding the dreamer that prevent him from achieving his dreams.
  • Fire in the dream of a seeker of knowledge is interpreted as one of the good dreams that expresses good knowledge and success in life, while seeing fire that devours the house is an indication of the dreamer's continuous effort to change himself and is not satisfied with his situation.
  • Dreaming of fire coming out of his hands is an indication that the dreamer is a corrupt person, who wreaks havoc on the earth and causes injustice to many people, and he must repent.

Fire in the dream for Ibn Sirin

  • It is believed that Ibn Sirin fire in a dream is good if it does not hurt or die.
  • If the dreamer sees that he is burning in the fire, this is evidence of the existence of evildoers who speak badly about the dreamer, and if they are strong, this means severe suffering from this talk.
  • Dreaming of a blazing fire that flies everywhere is evidence that the dreamer is seeking to incite sedition and spread lies and rumors among people.
  • Seeing a fire in the house and destroying furniture is a bad vision and warns that one of the secrets will be harmed, but if his finger is burned, this is a sign of forging facts and not telling the truth.

Fire in the dream for Ibn Shaheen

  • Ibn Shaheen and Ibn Sirin agree that fire in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will reach a higher social status and be among the influential people in society, and this is evidence that he will achieve many achievements in the coming period.
  • Dreaming of a blazing fire and being unable to extinguish it means that the dreamer has committed a serious mistake and will be punished for it unless he repents and returns to the path of truth and justice again.
  • Ibn Shaheen says that seeing flames and the dreamer's extreme fear is evidence of regret and fear of punishment, and it is also an expression of a desire to repent and make a great effort to please God Almighty.
  • And burning goods in the fire is evidence of an increase in their prices and the spread of poverty and misery in the country, according to what Ibn Shaheen said.

What is the interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a single woman?

  • The fire burning in the dream of an unmarried woman was interpreted by the jurists as her facing some problems and many difficulties in life, and it also indicates that her current path, whether in knowledge or work, is full of many obstacles, but if she sees that the fire is lit without causing harm, then she is expected to get married during this year.
  • As for her seeing the tongues of the flames burning, this means that she will soon reach an important position, in addition to stability in life in general, and seeing the house burning without smoke means that she will go to perform the Hajj pilgrimage this year.

A fire in a dream for a married woman

  • Seeing a fire in the house of a married woman tells her that she will hear good news from relatives concerning pregnancy and childbirth , but if the fire was dangerous and caused a lot of losses in the house, this is evidence of serious marital disputes that may lead to divorce.
  • The inability to determine the source of the fire in the married man's dream means providing many goods and livelihoods for her from several sources, and the vision also expresses the lady's effort in performing her household duties.
  • Escaping from a house fire in the dream of a married woman has a psychological connotation of her desire for divorce, getting rid of the responsibilities entrusted to her, and not being satisfied with the life she lives with her husband due to the lack of money.

Fire in the dream for a pregnant woman

  • Ibn Shaheen says that seeing fire in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence that she gave birth to a male child, but if she sees that she is trying to escape from the fire , this means that childbirth is near and will be facilitated, God willing.
  • Extinguishing a fire in the dream of a pregnant woman indicates that she will give birth to a female child, but if she sees that she is setting her clothes on fire, this is a sign of the many losses that will befall her.

Fire in a dream for a divorced woman

  • Interpreters say that seeing fire in a dream for a divorced woman is a sign of an upcoming marriage , if she sees a blazing fire, but if it catches fire, it is a warning vision for her to stay away from committing sins and repent to God Almighty.
  • Ibn Shaheen interpreted the dream that the fire burned the clothes of the divorced woman as a symbol of success and excellence in many fields, and also in the vision is an indication of achieving goals and ambitions after a period of problems.

Fire in a dream for a man

  • It is said that Ibn Sirin seeing fire in a dream for a person, and it is burning and fire is coming out of it, is a sign of the spread of sedition and sadness on earth, in addition to the martyrdom of those who see it from the Lord.
  • Dreaming of setting fire inside the house is evidence of sins, gossip, and disputes between the people of the house, and it can be a warning vision for the dreamer that he is committing sins and transgressions and needs to repent.
  • Seeing only one part of the house burning is an undesirable vision, which Ibn Sirin interpreted as evidence that the dreamer has been through many difficult problems and has been unable to overcome them.

Extinguishing fire in a dream

  • It is said that extinguishing a fire in a dream symbolizes the dreamer's ability to get rid of the obstacles and crises he is going through, and Ibn Shaheen says that the burning fire is intense anger and resentment towards the dreamer, so extinguishing it is an expression of overcoming difficult issues.
  • Also, seeing the fire being extinguished shows repentance and turning away from the path of sin and transgression that the dreamer is committing and his request for forgiveness from God, but if the fire catches fire, it was traveling to a country full of injustice.
  • It is said that Ibn Sirin : If the dreamer is righteous, then extinguishing the fire in his dream is evidence of an abundance of sustenance, and earning money , perhaps through inheritance.

House fire in a dream

  • It is said that Ibn Sirin about seeing a house burning is one of the visions that do not bring good, as it expresses a great financial loss that the dreamer will suffer in the coming period, and it also expresses the dreamer's imprisonment, especially if he is indebted.
  • I dreamed of a fire in the house...

Fire in a dream for a pregnant woman Ibn Shaheen says that seeing fire in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence that she gave birth to a male child, while if she sees herself trying to escape from the fire, it means that childbirth is near and it will be easy, God willing. Extinguishing a fire in the dream of a pregnant woman indicates that she will give birth to a girl, while if she sees herself setting fire to her clothes, this is a sign of the many losses that will befall her. Fire in a dream for a divorced woman Interpreters say that seeing fire in a dream for a divorced woman is a sign of a near marriage, if she sees a blazing fire, while if it is burning, it is a warning vision for her to stay away from practicing sins and repent to God Almighty. Ibn Shaheen interpreted the dream of fire burning the divorced woman's clothes as a symbol of success and excellence in many fields, and also an indication in the vision of achieving goals and ambitions after a period of problems. Fire in a dream for a man Ibn Sirin says that seeing fire in a dream on a person and it is blazing and fire is coming out of it is a sign of the spread of strife and sorrow on earth, in addition to the martyrdom of those who see it from the Lord. Dreaming of setting fire inside the house is evidence of sins, gossip, and disagreements among the people of the house and can be a warning vision for the dreamer that he is committing sins and transgressions and needs to repent. Seeing only one part of the house burning is an undesirable vision, which Ibn Sirin interpreted as evidence that the dreamer has gone through many difficult problems and the inability to overcome them. Putting out fire in a dream Putting out a fire in a dream symbolizes the dreamer's ability to get rid of the obstacles and crises that he is going through, and Ibn Shaheen says that the blazing fire is intense anger and resentment towards the dreamer, so putting it out is an expression of overcoming difficult issues. Also, seeing the fire extinguishing shows repentance and staying away from the path of sin and transgressions that the dreamer is committing and asking for forgiveness from God, while if the fire ignited, it was traveling to a country full of injustice. Ibn Sirin says: If the dreamer is righteous, then putting out the fire in his dream is evidence of an abundance of livelihood, earning money, perhaps through his inheritance. A house fire in a dream Ibn Sirin says about seeing a house burning that it is one of the visions that do not bring good, as it expresses a great material loss that the dreamer will suffer in the coming period, and it also expresses the dreamer's imprisonment, especially if he is in debt.
